nodes.text: The Firewasp was a model of speeder bike produced by Adno during the Cold War and Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. A variation on the standard type of speeder bike produced by Adno at the time, the A-R6 was primarily dark gray with dark red markings.
The Adno Firewasp was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Reputation reward for Binary Star Realty, and also as part of the Galactic Ace's Starfighter Pack.
